mapper.select: SELECT C.ID ID, C.TITLE TITLE, C.BODY BODY, C.CODE CODE, C.CREATED_AT CREATED_AT, C.LANG LANG, C.MEMBERID MEMBERID, IF(C.ANONYMOUS=1 AND M.MEMBERID!=#{memberid}, '익명', M.USERNAME) AS USERNAME, C.ANONYMOUS ANONYMOUS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKEPOST WHERE CATEGORYID=3 AND POSTID=C.ID) LIKES, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTPOST WHERE CATEGORYID=3 AND POSTID=C.ID) COMMENTS FROM CODEREVIEW C, MEMBERS M WHERE C.MEMBERID=M.MEMBERID ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT C.ID ID, C.TITLE TITLE, C.BODY BODY, C.CODE CODE, C.CREATED_AT CREATED_AT, C.LANG LANG, C.MEMBERID MEMBERID, IF(C.ANONYMOUS=1 AND M.MEMBERID!=#{memberid}, '익명', M.USERNAME) AS USERNAME, C.ANONYMOUS ANONYMOUS FROM CODEREVIEW C, MEMBERS M WHERE C.MEMBERID=M.MEMBERID AND ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CODEREVIEW(TITLE, BODY, CODE, CREATED_AT, MEMBERID, LANG, ANONYMOUS) VALUES(#{title}, #{body}, #{code}, now(), #{memberid}, #{lang}, #{anonymous})
mapper.update: UPDATE CODEREVIEW SET TITLE=#{title}, BODY=#{body}, CODE=#{code}, LANG=#{lang}, ANONYMOUS=#{anonymous} WHERE ID=#{id}
